name: Kill Stealer
description:
Tired of being the good guy? 

Tired of feeling like you don't matter??

Want to make other people as miserable as you???

Look no further than...

KILL STEALER

the hottest new piece of software from Good Story Games!

Play as an over-leveled Knight and steal super easy monster kills from poor level 1 scrubs just trying to enjoy their day. That'll show 'em!

---

Controls

Keyboard/MouseGamepadMovementWASDLeft ThumbstickLookMouseRight ThumbstickAttackRight ClickRight TriggerSprintLeft Shift KeyLeft Trigger

---

Developer Notes

Hey! I've been learning Unreal Engine for a few months now and after a few initial project kick-offs, I found myself feeling like I needed to "finish" something before continuing on my larger-scoped ideas. So I decided to challenge myself to finish a game within 7 days and release it no matter what. It must only have a clear simple scope, such as "It's just stealing kills."  

So please! Download the game and let me know what you think, even if it's bad-- that's okay! I can take it 🥲

The grass is too big. Yes. It is, thank you for noticing.

Fullscreen is broken. Just more game for you to enjoy!

It's straight-up not working on my sweet-ass gaming PC. That's probably for the best but I'm sorry anyway.

Please enjoy!!
